availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Gardner (Green County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and carpenter.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and carpenter. Hart County, Kentucky, native. Son of Elisha Gardner and Hanah Gardner. Married to Frances Gardner. Father of Elisha Gardner, James Gardner, Georgiann Gardner, and Braxton Gardner. Married to Ann Maria Gibson Gardener in Hart County, Kentucky, in September 1852. Father of Willis Gardner, Edward Gardner, John L. Gardner, Alice Gardner, Rufus Gardner, and Elbert Gardner. Cabinetmaker in Louisville in 1850. Cabinetmaker in Green County in 1860. Carpenter in Green County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 15A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 700.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Lower Bush Creek Precinct, p. 495A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Green County, KY, September 1863, p. 69.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Deaths.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Hart County Marriages.
